title: Woodie
author: Woodie
content: They say a picture is worth a thousand words, now imagine seeing such a tweet on Twitter that read out "El Salvador's bitcoin holdings were on FTX" ,and in case you missed the news on FTX...this is an exchange going under the bus following a potential bankruptcy after a cash shortage of ~$8billion ..And going back to the picture it shows a -100% as they claim El Salvador was holding its coins there which means everything could be lost.sourceLooking at the likes and potential impressions generated by such a tweet whats the impact of such a tweet? Can it be easily brushed off as a joke? Will El Salvador make an official statement on this to stop the FUD?
